info.author: Michel Alexandre Salim
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Prelude library for Python
==========================
This library provides functional programming constructs from languages
such as Haskell and Scala, implemented using existing Python libraries
such as ``abc`` (*abstract base class*) as appropriate.

The intention is for this to complement the existing ``functools`` library,
not to replace it.


Installation
------------
From an unpacked archive::

    $ python setup.py install

With `pip <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip>`_::

    $ pip install prelude

info.html_description:
This library provides functional programming constructs from languages such as Haskell and Scala, implemented using existing Python libraries such as abc (abstract base class) as appropriate.

The intention is for this to complement the existing functools library, not to replace it.

Installation

From an unpacked archive:

$ python setup.py install

With pip:
